```{shinylive-r}
#| standalone: true
#| viewerHeight: 600

library(shiny)
library(bslib)
library(ggplot2)

ui <- fluidPage(
    plotOutput(outputId = "plot1")

)

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  output$plot1<-renderPlot({
    df_pick<-source(url("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/BrittanyTroast-NOAA/BBESR_DataViz/main/Data_Obj/Data_R/brpeli_li.r"))
    df_data<-df_pick$value$data
    ggplot(df_pick, aes(x=year, y=value))+
      geom_point(color="darkturquoise")
    
  })
}

shinyApp(ui= ui, server = server)
```
